About me

Born & raised in small town in Russia. I'm genuinely inspired by industrial high precision machines and equipment, but also the same I feel about computer science. Over six years I have been studying for an engineer in the field of the industrial electronics, got a honors degree. I have had a chance to work as a designer, design-engineer, team lead and backend software developer, on a study and non commercial projects and as embedded software engineer and technical support engineer tier II for companies.

I draw on my experience of solving problems, intuitively breaking the problem into parts, identify bottlenecks and as a result find solutions.
    • Process automatization Everyone is lazy, but I little more than others. If I see any routine task, which can be solved by computer or some machine, I would prefer to make all by best make it automatic to free my time, and do more important stuff.
